welcome.title: Welcome to the Anthroposophical Journey
welcome.poem:
The human being is a seeker.
Seeking oneself,
Seeking the world,
Seeking the spirit.
And in this threefold search,
Finds the path of true education.
welcome.author: Rudolf Steiner

content.paragraph1: This course was created with love and dedication for you who have chosen Waldorf Education for your children. Like a seed germinating in fertile soil, Waldorf education nurtures not only the intellect but also the heart and hands of our children.
content.paragraph2: Here, we will explore together the foundations of Anthroposophy, the spiritual science developed by Rudolf Steiner, which serves as the philosophical basis for the pedagogy that has been transforming lives for over 100 years.
